attributes.action: Stop Gun Crime Masacre! Look After Number 1, The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time the UK stood up and demanded action against the disgusting attacks on young innocent children and adults who through no fault of their own are killed through rising gun crime! An innocent 11year old boy has to be the final straw. How many more lives must be lost while we fight wars abroad when there are wars on our streets!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
